backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining authorization, user profiles, app settings including new background mode, and resident-related types and access control checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old app settings to include the new residentProfileEditorBackgroundMode field with a default of solid white.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping settings-background-mode features to affected frontend files and components with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of many frontend files describing recent UI, settings, and resident-management feature updates.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v22-to-pro: Documentation for promoting Draft Version 22 to production with no code changes, including checklists and rollback steps.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v27-to-pro: Documentation for promoting Draft Version 27 to production using existing artifacts, including verification and rollback procedures.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variables defining colors, layout tokens, and dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the app root and favicon, linking to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React Query, sets up TanStack Router routes for residents, settings, and profile-related pages, and wraps the app in providers.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s ADL records in a table and provides a modal to add new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating a new ADL record, handling required fields and submitting via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Displays detailed boot-time error information with retry, logout, and diagnostic copy options.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for completing initial user profile setup, including role selection and optional related resident IDs.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Renders the application logo with variant-based sizing.
Main layout providing sidebar navigation, authentication actions, and routing outlet handling.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records in a table with an option to add new records if permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for creating a new MAR record, including medication, time, staff, and notes.
frontend/src/components/medications/admi: Defines allowed administration routes and a helper for generating route options.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medications with actions for adding, editing, discontinuing, and reactivating.
Shows a resident’s medications with controls to add, edit, or discontinue them.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal for adding a new medication with fields for dosage, route, times, physician, notes, and PRN.
Modal for editing an existing medication, supporting updates to dosage, route, scheduling, notes, and PRN.
frontend/src/components/resident-profile: Wraps children in a div that applies background mode styling from a custom hook.
Displays a resident's insurance records in a table with add and edit navigation when editable.
Renders a pharmacy info table for a resident and supports adding or editing entries.
Shows assigned physicians in a table with optional add and edit actions.
Lists responsible contacts with relationship and communication details plus add/edit controls.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Displays a badge indicating Full Code or DNR with corresponding styling.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal form for creating a new resident with fields for personal data, physicians, contacts, and medications.
Modal form for editing a resident’s details, including personal info, room data, status, and pharmacy info, and submitting updates via useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a print‑friendly resident profile report including demographics and related data.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a table of daily vital records for a resident and provides a button to open a modal for adding new vitals when permitted.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for entering and submitting new daily vital sign measurements using useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, settings, residents, meds, vitals, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useResidentProfileEdi: Reads display settings to determine the background mode and CSS class for the resident profile editor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes a resilient backend actor with retries, handles authenticated vs anonymous creation, and exposes refetch and retry controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode settings, and custom background modes for the resident profile editor.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Provides helper functions for permission checks and user type labels based on profile and admin status.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/resident-profile/insu: Form page to add new insurance info for a resident and submit via mutation.
Loads existing insurance data for a resident and provides a form to edit and update it.
frontend/src/pages/resident-profile/phar: Form page for adding pharmacy details to a resident and saving via mutation.
Fetches resident pharmacy info and allows editing and updating a specific pharmacy entry.
frontend/src/pages/resident-profile/phys: Form to create a new physician entry for a resident and submit through an add mutation.
Loads an existing physician record for a resident and provides a form to update it.
frontend/src/pages/resident-profile/resp: Page for adding a responsible contact to a resident, handling form state and submit via mutation then navigating back.
Page for editing an existing responsible contact, preloading data from resident info and submitting updates.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Displays resident statistics and a searchable, filterable list of residents with an option to add new ones.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Shows detailed resident information with editing, medication management, vitals, and section navigation based on permissions.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and update display preferences such as print button visibility and editor background mode.
frontend/src/utils/dateOnly.ts: Utility for parsing YYYY-MM-DD dates and calculating timezone-safe ages with formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/errorDiagnostics.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into structured diagnostics and formats them for display or logging.
frontend/src/utils/residentSorting.ts: Sorting utilities for residents based on room numbers with optional secondary sorting by name or status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, architectural notes, existing features, and pending feature requests for display preference toggles and backend schema updates.
